mapper.update: UPDATE client set email=#{email}, user_name=#{userName}, password=#{password}, birthdate=#{birthdate}, tx_id=#{transaction.txId}, tx_host=#{transaction.txHost}, tx_user_id=#{transaction.txUserId}, tx_date=#{transaction.txDate} WHERE client_id=#{clientId} and status=1

UPDATE client set status=#{status}, tx_id=#{transaction.txId}, tx_host=#{transaction.txHost}, tx_user_id=#{transaction.txUserId}, tx_date=#{transaction.txDate} WHERE client_id=#{clientId} and status=1
mapper.select: SELECT b.first_name as firstName, b.first_surname as firstSurname, b.second_surname as secondSurname, b.ci as ci, b.phone as phone, a.email as email, a.user_name as userName, a.password as password, a.birthdate as birthdate, c.number as number, c.street as street, c.zone as zone, c.city as city, c.country as country FROM client a, person b, address c WHERE b.person_id = a.person_id AND a.address_id = c.address_id AND a.client_id=#{idClient} AND a.status = 1
SELECT person_id FROM client WHERE client_id = #{clientId} and status = 1
SELECT address_id FROM client WHERE client_id = #{clientId} and status = 1

SELECT a.client_id as clientId, b.first_name as firstName, b.first_surname as firstSurname, b.second_surname as secondSurname, a.user_name as userName, a.email as email, b.ci as ci FROM client a, person b WHERE b.person_id = a.person_id AND a.status = 1

SELECT a.address_id as addressId, a.number as number, a.street as street, a.zone as zone, a.city as city, a.country as country FROM address a, client b WHERE b.client_id = #{clientId} and b.address_id = a.address_id and a.status = 1
